faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear your doubts about our services

question1.question: How long does it take to create a logo?
question1.answer: Our AI logo creation process takes between 24 to 48 hours. You'll receive 3 initial options and can request adjustments.

question2.question: Can I make changes to the design?
question2.answer: Yes! We include up to 3 revision rounds in all our packages. We want to ensure you're 100% satisfied.

question3.question: What file formats do I receive?
question3.answer: You'll receive your logo in PNG, JPG, SVG and PDF, all in high resolution, ready for digital use and printing.

question4.question: Is there a satisfaction guarantee?
question4.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund 100% of your investment.
